typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		a as integer,
		b as date,
		c as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:(concat('prueba_evolucion_esquema',currentDate())),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
